1.content: Remove all demo/mock data and replace with real functionality
1.details: 1. Remove mockData.ts file and all sample data files. 2. Replace mock data with real database queries. 3. Remove sample files from public/dist folders. 4. Update all components to use real data.

2.content: Replace paid Hugging Face API with free alternatives
2.details: 1. Remove hardcoded API key. 2. Implement client-side free AI APIs (like OpenAI-compatible free endpoints or browser-based analysis). 3. Use free sentiment analysis and text processing libraries. 4. Add fallbacks for offline processing.

3.content: Remove authentication requirements and make it fully public
3.details: 1. Remove auth requirements from all edge functions. 2. Update frontend to work without login. 3. Make all features accessible without user accounts. 4. Remove authentication context and related components.

4.content: Clean up Supabase database and ask about data retention
4.details: 1. Check current database state and tables. 2. Ask user about keeping existing data vs starting fresh. 3. Clean up unnecessary functions and data. 4. Optimize database structure for public usage.

5.content: Add free data sources and real-time functionality
5.details: 1. Integrate free public APIs (weather, stocks, news, etc.). 2. Add real-time data processing. 3. Implement free OCR and document processing. 4. Add data export in multiple formats.

6.content: Test and deploy the fully functional platform
6.details: 1. Test all features with real data. 2. Ensure zero-cost operation. 3. Verify all edge functions work without auth. 4. Deploy and validate the complete platform.
